extendedInfo.description: Good News App is the mobile version of the 'Today's Good News' website brought to you from the Dominicans in Tallaght Retreat Centre, Dublin 24, Ireland. Consisting of 'Latest' articles including; Daily Gospel Commentaries: This page gives a very brief commentary by Donagh OâShea on the gospel reading for each day of the month. Wisdom Line: In their many different idioms the classical spiritual writers have attempted to throw light on the eternal question of union with God. Every month we give you a brief passage from a spiritual classic. Between Ourselves: This is our Question and Answer desk. We respond to one question each month. If you would like to ask a question, please send it to question@goodnews.ie Jacob's Well: These are brief articles, one per month, on a wide variety of topics concerning the living of the Christian life. Lectio Divina & Unfolding the story of Jesus articles, updated monthly. Our App also includes a listing of upcoming Events and Retreats at the Tallaght Retreat Centre, Audio from various artists and in-house meditation sessions. Video from the Dominicans in Ireland, streamed content from our Social networks, (Facebook and Twitter)

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: This is an awesome website. The answers to tough questions within the \"between\" section are refreshing. This site is restoring my desire to know people of faith. Thought-provoking, faith-inducing, inviting to all - no matter one\'s faith or lack thereof. My soul has longed for such a community of love. I have had this app for a few months. I now tell everyone about it and read \"entries\" to my adult children. Thank you.
reviews.author: J Dub
